War on a String () is a 2015 Chinese suspense crime action film directed by Li Kai. It was released on May 8, 2015 in China.
Cast
*Vincent Chiao
*Andrew Lin
*Lin Jinfeng
*Han Qiuchi
*Qi Yunpeng
*Peng Bo
*Gao Fei
*Hu Shuangquan
Reception
By May 8, 2015, the film had grossed  at the Chinese box office.
